script.title: ex-vrf-import.slax
script.author: travisohara
script.synopsis: This script will automatically create either single route target or multiple route targers using policies.
script.description: Use of the key-word 'vrf-targets' is required to identify the macro and numbering or the route distinguishers and route distinguishers are mandatory.
